text:
Ebrahim Abadi (, 15 August 1934 – 31 October 2019) was an Iranian actor. Abadi was known for his roles in "Mokhtarnameh", "On Tiptoes", "Dar Chashm-e Baad" and "Grand Cinema". He was born in Tabriz, Iran.
Abadi died on 31 October 2019 at a hospital in Tehran while in a coma after suffering a heart attack at the age of 85.
